item.title: Holes in road where white lines should be!, 11th November
item.description:
It looks like a load of the white lines (middle of road) have just been hollowed out and a big hole left in their place! They've been like this for weeks now and nothing gets done....it might not be an 'immediate danger' to the public but if a bike wheel goes into one of these it won't be happy days - please do something good with the Council Tax and sort this road out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Cray Road, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No road markings!, 11th November
item.description:
There are absolutely no road markings at the right turn lane/entrance to Tesco superstore and the adjacent businessness - this means that cars are waiting across the road because of poor positioning and the queues are getting worse! Please PLEASE mark out the white lines and and rhs arrow on the road ASAP before the Xmas rush frays tempers....
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Edgington Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bed & Mattress fly-tipped to pavement, 11th November
item.description:
Bed & Mattress fly-tipped to pavement opposite Haften Road, adjacent to Ashmore Court. This has not come from Ashmore Court. Residents are monitoring activity and it is being dumped from vehicles. The location is in a blind spot, not overlooked by properties. Please can some CCTV be deployed to catch these in action.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dowanhill Road, Catford South, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegally parked abandoned car, 11th November
item.description:
This car has been illegally parking/abandoned on this spot since 22nd September without movement. This is a private land and the law states that the local authority must give 15 days notice to propose to remove the vehicle. Itâ€™s been more than a month since the last report on this car on this site and almost 2 months since the car is parked without movement. The car needs to be towed away

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hubbard Street, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped paint and plasterboard, 11th November
item.description:
Plasterboard has been dumped and paint has been poured over it, sticking it to the ground. Cars have then driven through it leaving paint marks all over the road. It's been there a week or so.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 73, Braxfield Road, Brockley, London
Report on FixMyStreet
